content.html: The Natwest (then RBS) received £45bl of taxpayers money in the 2008 bank bailout. Today they pleaded guilty to allowing the laundering of £400ml by one single customer. No person will be prosecuted, no one will bat an eye lid. It’s a rigged system we need to bust.
content.value:
The Natwest (then RBS) received £45bl of taxpayers money in the 2008 bank bailout. Today they pleaded guilty to allowing the laundering of £400ml by one single customer. 

No person will be prosecuted, no one will bat an eye lid. It’s a rigged system we need to bust.
